articles.title: Tributes paid to US journalist shot dead by Russians in Ukraine - CNN
articles.description: Award-winning American journalist Brent Renaud was killed by Russian forces in the Ukrainian city of Irpin, police in Kyiv said. Another American journalist, Juan Arredondo, was wounded.

articles.title: Vladimir Putin warning from Navy SEAL who killed Osama Bin Laden - Daily Record
